description: Numbers n such that 5 and 8 occur juxtaposed in the base 9 representation of n but not of n-1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,9],{5,8}]>0||SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,9],{8,5}]>0,1,0],{n,2000}],{0,1}]][[2]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition  and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 23 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
